short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Fully featured Chrome Extension Wallet for Phantasma Blockchain.
short.de: Komplett ausgestattete Chromeerweiterungsbrieftasche für die Phantasma-Blockchain.
short.es: Extensión de chrome para gestionar billeteras en Phantasma Blockchain.
short.fr: Extension Chrome pour un portefeuille riche et fonctionnel pour la blockchain Phantasma.
short.it: Estensione Chrome con un portafoglio completo per Phantasma Blockchain.
short.nl: Uitgebreide Chrome Extensie Wallet voor de Phantasma Blockchain.
short.no: Chrome-utvidelse for Phantasmas blokkjede tettpakket med funksjoner.
short.pt_PT: Carteira de blockchain Phantasma para o Chrome.
short.ru: Полнофункциональное браузерное расширение-кошелек для блокчейна Phantasma.
short.tr: Phantasma blokzinciri için tam özellikli Chrome cüzdan eklentisi.
short.vi: Ví mở rộng Chrome đầy đủ tính năng cho Phantasma Blockchain
short.zh_CN: Chrome扩展钱包拥有Phantasma区块链的全部特色

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥New in v1.5.5
- updated rpc & explorer following last chain changes

Features:
- Create/Login/Export wallet
- Phantasma Mainnet/Testnet/Privatenet
- Read-only or Read-write (HEX or WIF format) for any Phantasma Wallet
- BIP 39 seed words support
- Stake/Unstake
- Claim KCAL
- Send assets
- Send/Burn NFT
- Swaps from/to NEO and Ethereum and BSC
- Interact with dApps through Phantasma Link
